extends Object
implements JournalCheckpointStreamable

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(long tableId,
          int columns,
          ByteBuffer metadata)
        Add a raw table.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the raw table
        columns - The number of columns in the raw table
        metadata - The additional metadata of the raw table
        Returns:
        true if the raw table does not exist before and successfully added, false otherwise

      • remove

        public boolean remove(long tableId)
        Remove a raw table.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the raw table
        Returns:
        true if the table exists and successfully removed, false otherwise

      • contains

        public boolean contains(long tableId)
        Whether the raw table exists.
        Parameters:
        tableId - the id of the raw table
        Returns:
        true if the table exists, false otherwise

      • getColumns

        public int getColumns(long tableId)
        Get the number of the columns of a raw table.
        Parameters:
        tableId - the id of the raw table
        Returns:
        the number of the columns, -1 if the table does not exist

      • getMetadata

        public ByteBuffer getMetadata(long tableId)
        Get the metadata of the specified raw table.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the raw table
        Returns:
        null if it has no metadata, or a copy of the internal metadata

      • getTableInfo

        public RawTable getTableInfo(long tableId)
        Get the raw table info.
        Parameters:
        tableId - the raw table id.
        Returns:
        the raw table info if the table exists, null otherwise

      • updateMetadata

        public void updateMetadata(long tableId,
                  ByteBuffer metadata)
                    throws TableDoesNotExistException
        Update the metadata of the specified raw table. If the new specified metadata is null, the internal metadata will be updated to an empty byte buffer.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the raw table
        metadata - The new metadata of the raw table
        Throws:
        TableDoesNotExistException - when the table does not exist

      • streamToJournalCheckpoint

        public void streamToJournalCheckpoint(JournalOutputStream outputStream)
                               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: JournalCheckpointStreamable
        Writes to the journal, in a streaming fashion, via the JournalOutputStream
        Specified by:
        streamToJournalCheckpoint in interface JournalCheckpointStreamable
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the output stream to write to for the journal checkpoint.
        Throws:
        IOException
